backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend canister entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: moving 'No' button, 3-page flow navigation, and creative multi-page date invitation flow with high confidence test coverage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend source files describing the romantic date invitation app's components, pages, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, defining neutral grayscale palette and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with 'Date Invitation' title, root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing three-page state machine (invitation, persuasion, success), tracking hover attempts on 'No' button to trigger page transitions, with romantic background image and footer.
frontend/src/components/MovingNoButton.t: Interactive button that repositions itself to random viewport coordinates on hover/touch, preventing clicks and notifying parent of hover attempts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing ICP backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with warm romantic OKLCH color palette for light/dark modes, serif typography, and custom animations (fade-in, spin-slow, slide-in, page-transition).
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point wrapping App with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/InvitationPage.tsx: First page component displaying romantic date invitation to Chaitanya with decorative hearts, 'Yes' button, and MovingNoButton that tracks hover attempts.
frontend/src/pages/PersuasionPage.tsx: React component for the persuasion page (page 2) that displays a playful message encouraging the user to say yes, listing benefits of the date with hearts and decorative elements, and includes a CTA button to accept.
frontend/src/pages/SuccessPage.tsx: React component for the success page (page 3) that displays a celebratory message with animated hearts, sparkles, and party poppers when the user accepts the date invitation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file that extends the default theme with custom colors (using OKLCH color space), container settings, and includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting a 3-page interactive date invitation website with existing features including a landing page, moving 'No' button, and multi-page flow architecture.
